section:
Because the House of Wistaria is related to the royal family, they especially revere the goddess Nisoderu, spirit of the sun, who is believed to be the first ancestor of the Sovereign. Her shrine is in the east garden of the mansion. Two painted screens that show the veiled goddess arising from the cavern of night slides back to give entry to the inner chapel, a room whose bare wooden floor and walls have been polished until they gleam like red gold.
